text: The 1975–76 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers men's basketball team represented Western Kentucky University during the NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Hilltoppers were led by Ohio Valley Conference Coach of the Year Jim Richards and OVC Player of the Year Johnny Britt.
